de.coreengine.asset

Class TextureLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.coreengine.asset.TextureLoader

  • public class TextureLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for loading Textures from drive

    Supported Formats:

    JPEG baseline & progressive (12 bpc/arithmetic not supported, same as stock IJG lib
    PNG 1/2/4/8/16-bit-per-channel
    TGA (not sure what subset, if a subset)
    BMP non-1bpp, non-RLE
    PSD (composited view only, no extra channels, 8/16 bit-per-channel)
    GIF (*desired_channels always reports as 4-channel)
    HDR (radiance rgbE format)
    PIC (Softimage PIC)
    PNM (PPM and PGM binary only)

    Author:
    Darius Dinger

    • Method Detail

      • loadTextureFileMeta

        public static MetaTexture loadTextureFileMeta(java.lang.String textureFile,
                                              boolean mipmap,
                                              int filtering,
                                              boolean asResource)
        Load MetaTexture file and store into MetaTexture object
        Parameters:
        textureFile - Path to MetaTexture relative to application
        mipmap - Uses this MetaTexture mipmapping/anisotropic filtering (if supported)
        filtering - Wich filtering mathod (GL_NEARES, GL_LINEAR, ...)
        asResource - Loading MetaTexture from resources
        Returns:
        MetaTexture object

      • loadTextureFile

        public static void loadTextureFile(java.lang.String textureFile,
                                   boolean mipmap,
                                   int filtering,
                                   boolean asResource)
        Loading a MetaTexture file into an opengl texture and storing into asset database
        Parameters:
        textureFile - Path to MetaTexture relative to application
        mipmap - Uses this MetaTexture mipmapping/anisotropic filtering (if supported)
        filtering - Wich filtering mathod (GL_NEARES, GL_LINEAR, ...)
        asResource - Loading MetaTexture from resources

      • loadCubeMap

        public static void loadCubeMap(java.lang.String path,
                               java.lang.String ext,
                               boolean asResource)
        Loading cube map texture from abstract path and extension and storing into asset database. The cube map file names will be generated by:
        path + ['_lf', '_rt', '_up', '_dn', '_ft', '_bk'] + '.' + ext
        Parameters:
        path - Abstract path to the cubemap
        ext - Extension of the cube map Textures
        asResource - Loading cube map Textures from resources

      • loadCubeMap

        public static void loadCubeMap(java.lang.String key,
                               java.lang.String left,
                               java.lang.String right,
                               java.lang.String top,
                               java.lang.String bottom,
                               java.lang.String front,
                               java.lang.String back,
                               boolean asResource)
        Loadig cubemap texture from 6 texture files and storing into asset database
        Parameters:
        key - Key in the asset database
        left - Left sube map texture
        right - Right sube map texture
        top - Top sube map texture
        bottom - Bottom sube map texture
        front - Front sube map texture
        back - Back sube map texture
        asResource - Loading cube map Textures from resources
